title: Ticket #1242: Add config knob for strict target scoping
description:
Now that we can have old-ClassAd-style scoping of attribute references in new ClassAds (#1234), we should have a config knob to disable it. This will allow users to test their configuration before upgrading to a future version of Condor where we remove the old-ClassAd-style scoping.

The knob will be called STRICT_CLASSAD_EVALUATION and will default to False.
